department: Social Affairs, Culture, Media, and Civil Society
procurement_category: Services to support the delivery of programming, activities and events - Culture  Xavier  employer contract
short_summary: The objective of this project is to support the smooth execution of activities and events related to the core values of the department, such as arts, cultural heritage, citizenship, equality, leisure activities, media, public art, and youth activites.
description: The department aims to create a vibrant and lively society through innovative and artistic approaches to youth issues, as well as maintaining and promoting the richness of Canadian culture. The contractor will perform a subtask to consult and advise the employers on various areas of work-.He/She will have the duties and tasks of advice the employer contract
